title: Add Project Settings UI

context.problem: ProjectSettings.svelte exists but no way to access it

requirements: Add settings icon button next to project selector
Icon should only show when specific project selected (not 'All Projects')
User can edit project name and description
Save changes updates project and refreshes list
acceptance_criteria: AC-1: User can see settings icon when project selected
AC-2: Icon hidden when 'All Projects' selected
AC-3: Clicking icon opens settings panel
AC-4: User can edit project name
AC-5: User can edit project description
AC-6: Changes are saved and reflected in UI
